net.sourceforge.gjtapi.jcc
Class ConnListenerAdapter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.gjtapi.jcc.CallListenerAdapter
        |
        +--net.sourceforge.gjtapi.jcc.ConnListenerAdapter
public class ConnListenerAdapter
extends CallListenerAdapter
implements javax.telephony.ConnectionListener

This is a simple adapter that listens for JTAPI Connection events and translates them into JccConnection events. Creation date: (2000-10-11 15:09:31)
